name: Snow Leopard Chase
description:
Control this fast and hungry Snow Leopard Eagle as he races across this massive open world snow terrain. Battle against Mammoth, Bears, Rabbits, Moose, and Wolves. Help him grow from a weak cat into a strong Snow Leopard. Hunt down your natural enemies in a quest to become the best. Thrive in this harsh Arctic environment.
Top Game Features:
**9 Different Arctic Animals included
**Highly Detailed 3D Winter Landscape
**Dynamic times of day plus snow and rain
**Improve your Leopard Speed, Strength, and Stamina
**6 Special Battle Sim Scenarios
**12 Challenging Adventures to Complete

CHANGING CONDITIONS
Snow Storms, Rain Storms, Day, Night, Sunrise. Experience a different game every time you play. Different animal encounters for each game played.
UPGRADE YOUR HUNTING SNOW LEOPARD
Spend your meat units to increase your Strength, Stamina, and Speed. This is the key to thrive and survive.
6 HEAD TO HEAD SCENARIOS
Try to Survive these challenging battles. 6 different animal attack scenarios.
SNOW ANIMALS - 9 INCLUDED
Moose, Mammoth, Brown Bear, Wolf, Deer, Penguin, Rabbit, and Polar Bear included.
FANTASTIC 3D GAMEPLAY
Easy animal simulation controls and epic 3D graphics with open world style game play.
